name: Swarm Development Update
description: Callum presents a general update from research and bee for approximately 5 minutes. Antonio may interject with follow-up questions. Esad and Alok provide a more in-depth segment

speakers.name: Alok Nerurkar
speakers.bio: Senior Developer with the Bee team

speakers.name: Antonio Gonzalo
speakers.bio: Entrepreneur and product guy. Former corporative soul, now following the crypto rabbit hole as deep as Finney takes us. Busy bee.

speakers.name: Callum Toner
speakers.bio: Product Manager at Swarm, working on Bee team, Research team, and everything in between. Following the progress in Swarm from research to reality to make an unstoppable product

speakers.name: Esad Akar
speakers.bio: Engineer in the Bee Team. Working everyday to improve the core Go Bee client, and help Swarm continue to be a healthy, reliable, and performant network.
